markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Snapping Turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=836)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Snapping turtles are freshwater reptiles with a long flexible neck, a sharp piercing beak, and a confrontational temperament that doesn't prevent some spellcasters from choosing these creatures as familiars. They weigh about 20 pounds and have shells around 18 inches in length.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Snapping Turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=836)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 269 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +3; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** The snapping turtle can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +1 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 9

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +6,
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Clench Jaws** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The snapping turtle damaged a creature with a jaws Strike in its previous action; **Effect** The snapping turtle clenches its jaws down and automatically deals an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage to the creature it just bit.

**Shell Defense** <actions string="Single Action" />  The snapping turtle retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 18, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-157" />
name: Snapping Turtle

text: Snapping Turtle Snapping turtles are freshwater reptiles with a long flexible neck, a sharp piercing beak, and a confrontational temperament that doesn't prevent some spellcasters from choosing these creatures as familiars. They weigh about 20 pounds and have shells around 18 inches in length. Shell Defense Single Action The snapping turtle retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 18, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action.
